title: Presentation: Beyond Code: Building a Personal Brand to Boost Your Career
description: Roland Meertens and Steef-Jan Wiggers discuss actionable strategies for senior software developers and architects to build a powerful online presence. Learn how to effectively use LinkedIn, personal blogs, and community contributions like InfoQ to enhance career opportunities and establish yourself as a thought leader in the tech industry. By Roland Meertens, Steef-Jan Wiggers
author: Roland Meertens, Steef-Jan Wiggers
excerpt: Roland Meertens and Steef-Jan Wiggers practical tips for developers & architects to build their professional online presence.
